summary:
Yes is a famous English rock band that started in 1968. They are known for their complex music, called progressive rock. The band's original members were Jon Anderson, Chris Squire, Peter Banks, Tony Kaye, and Bill Bruford. Over time, many musicians have been part of the group.

Yes released many popular albums in the 1970s and 1980s, like "Close to the Edge" and "90125." They had success with songs like "Roundabout" and "Owner of a Lonely Heart." The band has won awards and is in the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame. Yes continues to make music and perform, even after some original members passed away.
title: Yes (band)
